body_text: Actually I intended to use sri_hash specifically because it matched the spec for subresource integrity. That matches well with what I wanted (integrity of a subresource) and is the most easily available spec I know of that includes the algorithm of the hash in the string. I think that it's use is appropriate here.
body: Actually I intended to use `sri_hash` specifically because it matched the spec for subresource integrity. That matches well with what I wanted (integrity of a subresource) and is the most easily available spec I know of that includes the algorithm of the hash in the string.
